name: German for Kids
description: German for Kids is a free educational application to learn basic German words in a fun way.  Categories of German for Kids -Animals -Numbers -Fruits -Vegetables -Colors -Transport -Countries -Occupations -School Objects -Verbs -Sports -Music Instruments -Clothes -Foods -Kitchen -Bathroom   Parts of German for Kids Learning: A random German word from the selected category is displayed with its picture and pronunciation Game 1: One random picture from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct German word from the options. Game 2: One random German word from the selected category is displayed and you are asked to select the correct picture from the options.
